name: TheFamilyBiblegame
0:
”Alexa, open family bible game”
”Alexa, start family bible game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family bible game
des:
Welcome to the Family Bible Game. 
 This game will test your knowledge of the Bible in a very unique way. 
 Alexa will ask you questions and provide feadback as to rather your answers be correct or wrong. 
 This game is safe for the entire family. Alexa will walk you through the game and my hope is that you will have fun with it. 
 This skil was made via the Blueprint section in the Alexa app on my iphone. if it crashes or freezes, it is NOT my fault. Rather, the fault is in the Blueprint. 
 If you have enjoyed this game then by all means leave me a review. Leaving your review really encourages me to continue with it. 
 
 
 
 
 have questions you wish to see aded? 

 email me. 

 TimothyClarkMusic@me.com 


 enjoy the game.
